title: Jones Praise
author: Jones Praise
content: How to get profile link on the forum?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: I'm guessing you're looking for yours? If so click on "Profile" (see the top of the page) ¬†-> "Show summary" (or show posts) from the left menu -> And then remove the ;sa=summary from the URL.Or, if you want an easier way, you can just click on your username (on this post or any of your other posts) and it will take you straight to your profile (while showing the ID). This is yours:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3564126

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: Jones Praise on August 13, 2023, 12:13:41 PM How to get profile link on the forum?Click your profile and then click the summary under the profile info. Your profile link is the URL up to the UID number(u=xxx). ¬†There's a lot of way to get it especially when you are already on your profile. Almost any clickable link there related to your stats will give you a profile link.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: To make it easy for yourself, go to one of your posts, you do see a link (of your name) at the left hand side, click on your name link and that is your profile link.This is my own for example:I can see my name in blue at the left hand side of every of my post. I can click on it to get my profile link. This is it after I clicked on my username _act_ at the left hand side of any of my posts:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3254306

comments.author: zaim7413
comments.body: The three comments above will direct you to get your profile link, even though the method is different, the goal is still the same. Op, you need to learn one of the ways suggested above to get rid of your curiosity about how to get a private profile link. Please save the profile link https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3564126 in the notes to make it easier to retrieve it if needed.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Click on profile tab on your screen then you have to click on the following option which you can see in the pic highlighted:Tab --> Show the last posts of this person Once you do that then you have to copy the link of that page which will open after clicking the show the last post of this person. The link will be something like this:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3564126;sa=showPostsBut that's not it, you still have to cut some characters from it which are the characters come just after the numbers. From example the numbers in your profile are 3564126. Six is the last digit you have to remove onward characters. Now the final profile link is following:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3564126
